about_the_game:
1、 First Impressions of Wasteland World

（1） Special protagonist appears

In this wasteland world, our protagonist has a unique identity - a cyborg. Its body structure cleverly blends mechanical and organic matter, giving the protagonist extraordinary strength and some stunning special abilities through this unique combination.

And the protagonist's' home 'is a train of wasteland. It is not just a simple place to stay, but also a mobile base for the protagonist to embark on an exploration journey. Every time the train departs, the secrets hidden under the wasteland will be revealed one by one.

（2） Danger and opportunity coexist

The entire wasteland world seems to be shrouded in a mysterious and dangerous layer of steam, making it difficult for people to see the whole picture, but they can always feel the dangerous aura hidden in the shadows.

Every exploration is undoubtedly a thrilling adventure. While taking risks, there will also be unexpected gains, such as discovering precious resources, mastering advanced technology, or meeting reliable allies.

2、 Partners and enemies in exploration

（1） The duality of intelligent organisms

The protagonist will meet various intelligent creatures. Some intelligent creatures are friendly to the protagonist. These friendly intelligent creatures often take the initiative to lend a helping hand to the protagonist, providing key advice and helping them find the materials hidden in corners that are extremely useful, enabling the train to become stronger faster and better adapt to various complex and harsh environments.

Even when the protagonist encounters other dangers, they will fight alongside the protagonist to jointly resist the enemy.

Not all intelligent creatures are so friendly. Some intelligent creatures are also hostile.

The interaction with intelligent creatures is crucial for the protagonist, as every communication, cooperation, or confrontation determines whether the protagonist can continue to grow and survive in this dangerous place.

（2） The threat of mechanical organisms

Among the many dangerous existences, those mechanical organisms infected by fungi are particularly frightening and can be considered one of the most terrifying threats on wasteland.

Their appearance looks dilapidated, with thick fungi and vines covering their originally hard metal shells. These fungi and vines seem to have life, spreading and growing freely on the bodies of mechanical organisms. Some even crawl into the gaps and entangle with the internal mechanical structures, as if they are about to completely "devour" the mechanical organisms.

They are extremely fierce and elusive. Once one detects the presence of "living creatures" around them, they will launch a reckless charge, relying on their own mechanical strength that is still retained after being infected by fungi, and charge forward recklessly. And the attack methods are simple and crude, often using rusty and fungal limbs or weapons to fiercely smash or swing towards the target.

3、 Measures to deal with crises

（1） Creative weapons and intricate traps

The protagonist will not face many dangers barehanded, and those exquisite traps and creative weapons are his powerful helpers in dealing with enemies.

The protagonist can transform discarded firearms by piecing together the advantageous components of different firearms to create a new weapon with greater power, faster firing rate, or higher shooting accuracy. Alternatively, some special energy devices can be used to attach energy blades to melee weapons, allowing them to not only inflict physical damage but also carry energy impact during attacks, enhancing their lethality.

Exquisite traps and creative weapons play a crucial role in combating enemies and protecting one's own safety.

（2） Drive the mecha deep into the tiger's den

When ordinary means are unable to cope with more difficult situations, the protagonist will choose to control mecha creatures and head towards the depths of the infected area. The tall and sturdy body of the mecha creature seems like a steel giant in the wasteland world.

4、 Interactive gameplay between players

（1） Win win cooperation

In the game "Wasteland World", the cooperative exploration gameplay between players is full of fun and benefits.

Working hand in hand with other players can bring unexpected advantages.

（2） Confrontation and competition

In addition to win-win cooperation, the confrontation and competition between players is also one of the most interesting and exciting gameplay in the wasteland world. On this barren land with scarce resources and precious technology, the control of rare resources and advanced technology has become the focus of players' competition.

5、 Expand the infinite possibilities of games

In the game "Wasteland World", the ability for players to design their own mods using the game's accompanying editing features is a major highlight, adding infinite possibilities and fun to the game. You can even modify everything in the game and share it with other players.

In terms of prop mods, players can add various novel props, equipment, or weapons. For example, in a swamp area filled with radiation, designing a firearm that can absorb radiation energy and convert it into attack power gives players an advantage in dealing with dangerous creatures there. Or create a device that can instantly clear a safe area, allowing players to have a brief respite and change the battle situation when surrounded by numerous enemies.

Map mods can open up new exploration spaces for games. Players may create an underground world map filled with high-tech relics, containing various advanced technologies waiting to be discovered and unlocked, greatly enriching the exploration content of the game.

There are also character mods that can change the appearance, abilities, and skills of game characters. Players can transform the appearance of the protagonist's cyborg into a classic mecha warrior from science fiction movies, not only making the appearance cooler, but also endowing it with new special skills.

Functional enhancement MODs should not be underestimated, such as improving the game UI to make operations more convenient and the interface more beautiful, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

In short, homemade mods allow every player to become a "creator" of the game, creating their own unique wasteland world and enjoying different gaming pleasures. And it can be shared with other players. Every player is the writer of the story of this wasteland world, and every effort and growth of everyone brings new vitality and change to this wasteland.

name: SteamMaze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7(sp1+) and above
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Open world, rich gameplay, picking up garbage, driving trains, traps, catching, cooking. Concepts and impacts such as food chain systems, weather, physical and chemical logic. All living beings have SAN values and intelligence. As a survival adventure game, it offers unlimited expansion content!
